text_summary: RSNA Pneumonia Detection Challenge dataset containing 30,000 frontal chest radiographs with bounding box annotations for pneumonia opacities. Derived from NIH ChestX-ray14 with additional expert annotation.
disease_labels: pneumonia (lung opacity), not normal/no lung opacity, normal

text_summary: NIH ChestX-ray14 is one of the largest publicly available CXR datasets with 112,120 frontal chest X-rays from 30,805 unique patients, labeled with 14 thoracic pathology categories using NLP-extracted labels.
disease_labels: atelectasis, cardiomegaly, consolidation, edema, effusion, emphysema, fibrosis, hernia, infiltration, mass, nodule, pleural_thickening, pneumonia, pneumothorax

text_summary: LIDC-IDRI contains 1,018 thoracic CT scans with annotations from four radiologists for lung nodule detection, segmentation, and malignancy rating. The reference standard for lung nodule CAD evaluation.
BraTS (Brain Tumor Segmentation) challenge dataset provides multi-institutional MRI scans with expert segmentation of gliomas into whole tumor, tumor core, and enhancing tumor regions.
CheXpert is a large chest radiograph dataset with 224,316 images from 65,240 patients at Stanford, labeled for 14 observations using an automated NLP labeler with uncertainty handling.
disease_labels: atelectasis, cardiomegaly, consolidation, edema, enlarged_cardiomediastinum, fracture, lung_lesion, lung_opacity, no_finding, pleural_effusion, pleural_other, pneumonia, pneumothorax, support_devices

text_summary: MIMIC-CXR is the largest publicly available dataset of chest radiographs with 377,110 images from 65,379 patients at BIDMC, linked to free-text radiology reports and structured labels.
disease_labels: 14 CheXpert labels extracted from free-text reports

text_summary: RSNA Intracranial Hemorrhage Detection Challenge dataset with 752,803 CT head slices labeled for five hemorrhage subtypes by expert neuroradiologists.
RSNA Cervical Spine Fracture Detection dataset with over 2,000 CT studies annotated for cervical vertebral fractures at each level (C1-C7) by expert radiologists.
LUNA16 (LUng Nodule Analysis) challenge provides 888 CT scans from LIDC-IDRI with standardized preprocessing and evaluation metrics for lung nodule detection algorithms.
ISBI 2015 Longitudinal MS Lesion Segmentation Challenge provides MRI data from 5 MS patients with 4-5 timepoints each, annotated by two expert raters for white matter lesion segmentation.
DeepLesion is a large-scale dataset of 32,735 CT lesions from 10,594 studies across multiple body regions, annotated with RECIST-style diameter measurements and bounding boxes.
disease_labels: lesion (lung, liver, kidney, mediastinum, pelvis, bone, abdomen, soft_tissue subtypes)

text_summary: Chest ImaGenome dataset provides scene graph annotations for 242,072 MIMIC-CXR images with 29 anatomical regions, 76 attributes, and spatial relationships between findings and anatomy.
disease_labels: 76 attributes across 29 anatomical regions (scene graph annotations)
